name: Domepad
description:
Hey guys!

This is the notepad I was talking about in the Dome browser project.

This is a software that I made and is very basic and can be used to create notes.

It is very similar to the Microsoft notepad.

This is my 2nd Visual Basic project.

if you think that I should add a feature then please comment on this post stating the feature I should add.

if you think that I should fix something then please point it out and tell me what is wrong and please try to suggest a fix by commenting on this post.

Stay tuned for more!
